com.percussion.pso.finder
Class PSOSQLContentFinder

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.services.assembly.impl.finder.PSBaseSlotContentFinder
      com.percussion.pso.finder.PSOSQLContentFinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.percussion.extension.IPSExtension, com.percussion.services.assembly.IPSSlotContentFinder
public class PSOSQLContentFinder
extends com.percussion.services.assembly.impl.finder.PSBaseSlotContentFinder
implements com.percussion.services.assembly.IPSSlotContentFinder

Slot finder that uses a raw SQL Query.

Parameters

There are 5 parameters: query, sqlparams, template, max_results and order_by.

query

The SQL Query to execute. This must be a valid SQL query for the backend repository. It may contain ? placeholder parameters as defined in java.sql.PreparedStatement. This parameter is mandatory. Never null or empty.

sqlparams

A List
